scope.title: What is a Transformer What is a Transformer What is a Transformer?
scope.author: Ka Ho Lau
scope.description: Your codnt to help Krita developers improve Krita. Post here to discuss the features and improvements. Gather feedback from fellow devs and the artists. Collecting use cases and feedback helps a lot in development.
